Toolbar¶

class gamegridp.gamegrid_toolbar.Toolbar(grid)[Quellcode]¶
add_button(text, img_path=None)[Quellcode]¶

adds a button to toolbar :param img_path: image button :param text: button text. This is also the text for the data variable in listen(event,data) :return:

draw()[Quellcode]¶

Creates a toolbar on the left side of the window
